decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Site Location Plan Received: 22 March 2016, Existing rear elevation, Existing front elevation and Existing side elevation Received:17 March 2016, Existing floor plan Received: 30 March 2016, 
Proposed floor plan Received: 06 May 2016, Proposed front elevation Received: 17 March 2016, Proposed side elevation and Proposed rear elevation Received: 11 May 2016
(All drawings are unnumbered)) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Any windows 1.7 metres above finished floor level and formed in the western side elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the house
